posts.post_content:
Posted By: William
A t206 Lajoie portrait, directly from the original collector, he kept a lot of his t206's in great shape, and this is a great looking example. theres one light crease on the bottom left corner, and small paper loss on the back of the card but overall it's in great shape. This card was well preserverd over the years. E-mail for scans. Make offer.
